amendment.description: Amendment encourages the development of small businesses in sub-Saharan Africa and encourages trade between small businesses in the United States and sub-Saharan Africa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 and printed in H. Rept. 106-236 to encourage the development of small businesses in sub-Saharan Africa and encourage trade between small businesses in the United States and sub-Saharan Africa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
